Klasse ServerJsonInterpreter

java.lang.Object
network.interpreters.ServerJsonInterpreter
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
JsonInterpreter
public class ServerJsonInterpreter extends Object implements JsonInterpreter
Interprets JSON messages received from clients and delegates the handling of these messages to appropriate methods based on the message type.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • ServerJsonInterpreter

      public ServerJsonInterpreter(ConnectionHandler connectionHandler, Server server, Logger logger)
      Constructs a new ServerJsonInterpreter.
      Parameter:
      connectionHandler - The connection handler associated with the client.
      server - The server instance.
      logger - The logger for recording events.

  • Methodendetails

    • interpretMessage

      public void interpretMessage(String jsonMessage)
      Interprets the incoming JSON message and delegates the handling to the appropriate method based on the message type.
      Angegeben von:
      interpretMessage in Schnittstelle JsonInterpreter
      Parameter:
      jsonMessage - The JSON message received from the client.

    • handleSetStartingPoint

      public void handleSetStartingPoint(SetStartingPointMessage sspm, ConnectionHandler handler, Server server)
      Handles the "Set Starting Point" action received from a client.

      This method processes the starting point coordinates selected by the player during setup.

      Parameter:
      sspm - The SetStartingPointMessage containing the X and Y coordinates.
      handler - The ConnectionHandler representing the client that sent the message.
      server - The Server instance.

    • handleSelectedCard

      public void handleSelectedCard(SelectedCardMessage sm, ConnectionHandler handler, Server server)
      Handles the "Selected Card" action received from a client during the programming phase.
      Parameter:
      sm - The SelectedCardMessage containing the chosen card and the register position.
      handler - The ConnectionHandler of the player.
      server - The Server instance.

    • handleRebootDirection

      public void handleRebootDirection(RebootDirectionMessage rm, ConnectionHandler handler, Server server)
      Handles the "Reboot Direction" action received from a client.

      This method rotates the player's robot to the specified direction.

      Parameter:
      rm - The RebootDirectionMessage containing the desired direction.
      handler - The ConnectionHandler of the player.
      server - The Server instance.

    • handleSelectedDamage

      public void handleSelectedDamage(SelectedDamageMessage sdm, ConnectionHandler handler, Server server)
      Handles the "Selected Damage" action received from a client.

      This method processes the damage cards selected by the player.

      Parameter:
      sdm - The SelectedDamageMessage containing the list of damage cards chosen.
      handler - The ConnectionHandler representing the client.
      server - The Server instance.

    • handleConnectionUpdate

      public void handleConnectionUpdate(ConnectionUpdateMessage cum, Server server)
      Handles the "Connection Update" action received from a client.

      This method processes connection updates such as client disconnections or changes in AI control.

      Parameter:
      cum - The ConnectionUpdateMessage containing the connection update details.
      server - The Server instance.

    • handleDiscardSome

      public void handleDiscardSome(DiscardSomeMessage dsm, ConnectionHandler handler, Server server)
      Handles the "Discard Some" action received from a client.

      This method processes the cards that the player has chosen to discard from their hand. It updates both the player's hand and their discard deck, then notifies all relevant clients.

      Parameter:
      dsm - The DiscardSomeMessage containing the list of cards to discard.
      handler - The ConnectionHandler representing the client.
      server - The Server instance.
